response.overview: Dr. Louis Turi examines the power of Superconscious and actualizing your goals with the power of thought. The superconscious is where true creativity is found. Expressions of this kind of creativity are distinctive from those that come from the subconscious. The superconscious is where ideas for truly great works of art, music, prose, poetry, great scientific discoveries, and deep spiritual experiences are found. Profound healing of ailments can also take place in this state.
response.title: Superconscious: The Power Within
